about_the_game: The Official Soundtrack of Hazel Sky brings life the true essence of Hazel Sky. Composed by the Brazilian musician Leonardo Cardoso Maciel the beautiful soundtrack is divided in two parts. The first one contains all the songs that Shane can play during the gameplay and the second brings all the ambient music that provide a full immersion into Hazel Sky's world.
